resources.string: We suggest you link your account to ensure its security. If you want to play games on multiple devices, please link your account and use the "switch account" function to log in to other devices.
You are logged in as a guest user,we recommend you to link in to the following accounts.
You might lose your account if you don\'t linked and logout.
You must be a guest to bind account.
The network connection is unstable, please check the network
Server connection failed, please try again later
Guest account is easy to lose, please bind the official account in time.
